------
[[include component:image-block
|name=http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-2912-jp/%E3%82%BB%E3%83%B3%E3%83%88%E3%83%A9%E3%83%AB%E3%83%91%E3%83%BC%E3%82%AF1.jpg
|align=center
|width=400px
|caption=Central Park On September 11, 2001, in the city of Manhattan while it was pulled into an anomalous dimension.
]]
+++ **Special Containment Procedures**
In observance of the [http://scp-int.wikidot.com/scp-2911-jp Hudson River Accord], SCP-2912-JP is not currently under the Foundation's control. The only actions the Foundation is permitted to carry out regarding SCP-2912-JP are creating reports and investigating SCP-2912-JP.

The management of SCP-2912-JP is carried out by the Central Park Management Committee,[[footnote]]A private non-profit organization contracted with the New York City Department of Parks and Recreation. [[/footnote]] and National September 11th Site Management Center[[footnote]]A subsidiary of the New York City Historic Landmarks Preservation Commission.[[/footnote]]. The purpose of this is to preserve the monument and prevent deterioration, and the Foundation will conduct activities through the front company "[[[scp-cn-757|Special Creative Park Organization]]]" upon request from the aforementioned organizations.

+++ **Description**

SCP-2912-JP is a large mechanical structure located in Central Park, Manhattan, New York City. Although it is currently in a severely damaged state, it has been determined that SCP-2912-JP was once roughly humanoid in shape, and each part is assumed to have a different origin. For this reason, the Foundation has assigned each SCP-2912-JP part an individual number from SCP-2912-JP-1 to -5.

[[collapsible show="▶︎Access: SCP-2912-JP-1"hide="-Access Granted"]]
[[div style="display: inline-block; border:dashed 1px #999999; background:#F5F5F5; float:center; width:84%; padding:1px 15px; margin: 10px 10px 10px 40px"]]
**SCP-2912-JP-1:** Torso/Right arm
The object's torso and right arm are a large combat humanoid prototype based on the "Hephaestus Model RX-78-2", manufactured by "Prometheus Mechanics", a subsidiary of [[[prometheus-labs-hub|GoI -014("Prometheus Labs")]]]. The mechanical structure appears to have been modified. Modifications are mainly made by welding and screwing together a number of mechanical parts shown below.
* Pumps modeled after the heart and aorta
* Complex gearboxes
* Pressure valves
* Large tubes
* Pipes
* Gears
* Stylized hammer and chisel engraved plates
These modifications were carried out by adherents of the Manhattan-Staten United Diocese, one of the major denominations of [[[church-of-the-broken-god-hub|the largest GoI-004A ("The Broken Church")]]], led by Father [http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/scp-1518-jp Nathan Fillmore][[footnote]]Known as PoI-2912-JP-A.[[/footnote]].

Despite the fact that the prototype machine it is based on is equipped with artificial intelligence for autonomous control, there is a cockpit inside SCP-2912-JP-1's thoracic cavity which was intended for human use. This specification has existed since the design stage, but has no known origin. Theories proposed by researchers on the purpose of the cockpit have included: its use as a means to amplify the effects of thaumaturgic drive assistance, deal with complex situations that cannot be handled by AI, to be used for manual operation in emergencies, and to prevent design errors.
[[/div]].
[[/collapsible]]
[[collapsible show="▶︎Access: SCP-2912-JP-2"hide="-Access Granted"]]
[[div style="display: inline-block; border:dashed 1px #999999; background:#F5F5F5; float:center; width:84%; padding:1px 15px; margin: 10px 10px 10px 40px"]]
**SCP-2912-JP-2:** Left arm
The object's left arm includes an outer armor made of a special alloy based on aluminium and mixed with multiple rare earth elements, and reinforced endoskeletal parts made by [[[anderson-robotics-hub|GoI-1115("Anderson Robotics")]]] Inside SCP-2912-JP-2, there are traces of multiple armaments being installed, including a machine gun with no bullets left and a space that appears to have housed small missiles.

It has been pointed out that the structure of SCP-2912-JP-2 is similar to the general-purpose humanoid drive weapon [http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/scp-1079-jp TH-G] Mk-II", produced by [http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/touheijyuukou-orientation GoI-8024("Touheijyuukou")]". The similarities are being investigated.

Additionally, the armor is engraved with a "[[[scp-2306|&]]]" [[footnote]]Which is believed to represent Anderson.[[/footnote]]  symbol, as well as the following text.

> = //**Punch the shark.**//

[[/div]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[collapsible show="▶︎Access: SCP-2912-JP-3"hide="-Access Granted"]]
[[div style="display: inline-block; border:dashed 1px #999999; background:#F5F5F5; float:center; width:84%; padding:1px 15px; margin: 10px 10px 10px 40px"]]
**SCP-2912-JP-3:** Right leg
The object's right leg is a mechanical structure constructed from the remains of a Ultra-Heavy Engagement Chassis "[[[goc-supplemental-equipment|Orange Suit]]]" used by [[[goc-hub-page|GoI-016 ("Global Occult Coalition")]]]. The remains of the Orange Suit that constitutes SCP-2912-JP-3 are clearly unable to stand on their own, however, the mechanical structure is connected to an reinforced by an exoskeleton made of unknown material. It appears to be chitinous in appearance and contains DNA that is generally similar to humans, although it shows strong structural similarities to coral.

This material is likely an [[[first-ivady-donation|anomalous item]]] and is currently being used as construction material by [[[manna-charitable-foundation-hub|GoI-082("Mana Charitable Foundation")]]]. It was likely integrated by utilizing hemomancy to increase its strength.
[[/div]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[collapsible show="▶︎Access: SCP-2912-JP-4"hide="-Access Granted"]]
[[div style="display: inline-block; border:dashed 1px #999999; background:#F5F5F5; float:center; width:84%; padding:1px 15px; margin: 10px 10px 10px 40px"]]
**SCP -2912-JP-4:** Left Leg
The left leg's structure made up of multiple junk parts, damaged metallic everyday items, and a large number of screws and nuts. Some of the materials that make up SCP-2912-JP-4 have metal tags and designated them as "[[[factory-hub|Property of the Factory]]]" and [[[dr-wondertainment-hub|golden plated with a purple W]]] attached.

The many parts that constitute SCP-2912-JP-4 are not welded together, instead, using various magical patterns drawn on the surface to create a single mechanical structure. Some of these patterns were used by members of [[[serpent-s-hand-hub|GoI-α-019("Serpent's Hand")]]] in battles with the Foundation in the past; and matches one discovered at the site of a former [[[herman-fuller-hub|GoI-233("Herman Fuller's Circus of the Disquieting")]]] location. Additionally, the Foundation is currently investigating the intent of the only non-functioning magical mechanism: //"We were Magical."//
[[/div]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[collapsible show="▶︎Access: SCP-2912-JP-5"hide="-Access Granted"]]
[[div style="display: inline-block; border:dashed 1px #999999; background:#F5F5F5; float:center; width:84%; padding:1px 15px; margin: 10px 10px 10px 40px"]]
**SCP-2912-JP-5:** Head
SCP -2912-JP is missing its head, and SCP-2912-JP-5 has, to date, not been recovered. According to Prometheus Mechanics' design, the main camera and antenna are located on the head.[[footnote]]According to the blueprint, the control AI processor body is located in the fuselage.[[/footnote]] According to recovered records, SCP-2912-JP's head has been damaged at least twice; the second head was not manufactured by Prometheus Mechanics, and is designated as SCP-2912-JP-5.

[[/div]]
[[/collapsible]]
------
+++ Addendum.2912-JP.1 > Origin

[[collapsible show="▶︎Access: Document - Hephaestus" hide="- Access Granted"]]

@@@@

[[div style="border: double #000"]]
@@@@
@@@@


[[include component:image-block
|name=http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-2912-jp/%E3%83%A1%E3%82%AB.jpg
|caption=RX-78
|align =center
|width=400px
]]
||||~ Specifications ||
|| Model number || Hephaestus Model RX-78-2 ||
|| Crown height || 26.0m ||
|| Body weight || 63.2t ||
|| Total weight || 80.0t ||
|| Armor material || Titanium alloy, tungsten alloy steel (joints) ||
|| Output || 6,380kW ||
|| Main engine || Talos power engine, Ever Heart resonance engine (thaumaturgical drive assist) ||
|| Others || [[[scp-2897|Bardeen]]] type AI-Birdeve for autonomous control ||

@@@@
@@@@
[[/div]]
[[/collapsible]]


"Hephaestus Model RX-78-2", which is the basis of SCP-2912-JP-1, is a large humanoid robot developed by Prometheus Mechanics. Since it is a prototype, it does not possess any clear armament in its design. However, according to Prometheus' internal documents, the primary intended use was as a weapon.

Due to the rapid growth of the paratech industry during the Cold War, automatons were attracting attention as a labor force in various industries such as the military, manufacturing, and services. The development of general-purpose humanoid automata intensified, and in later years Anderson Robotics' high-performance small humanoids, "[[[scp-1360|Peregrine]]]" and "[[[no-matter-what-mask-you-wear|Saker Series Android]]]" were becoming popular, and miniaturization was becoming mainstream.

Prometheus Mechanics took the route of designing giant aircraft as their niche in the industry. During this process, the Hephaestus model series was developed. Among them, the latest was the RX-78, designed with the assumption that it would be mass produced, as it far surpassed any android of the same size at the time in terms of performance.

However, due to the collapse of the Soviet Union in 1991 and the bursting of the Paratech bubble following the end of the Cold War, the entire Prometheus Labs Group fell into financial difficulties, and Prometheus Mechanics' top management cancelled the project. Accordingly, the three prototype aircraft, RX-78-1, -2, and -3, were stored in a warehouse owned by Prometheus Labs. Subsequent records are unclear as some documents were lost when Prometheus Mechanics went bankrupt in 1996.

The next time the RX-78 appeared on record was in 1999. The [http://scp-int.wikidot.com/1998-hub Collapse of the Veil]  brought on by [http://scp-int.wikidot.com/scp-1710-jp the Persephone Event] and the accompanying second paratech bubble caused the Prometheus Labs Group to make a major recovery in business performance. During the financial review process, it was discovered that three prototype machines had been stolen from the warehouse.

A later investigation by the Foundation revealed that after Prometheus Mechanics went bankrupt, the three prototypes were leaked onto the black market by members of [[[marshall-carter-and-dark-hub|GoI-012 ("Marshall, Carter & Dark, Inc.")]]], who had infiltrated the company prior. PoI-2912-JP-A purchased the RX-78-2, the second of the three prototypes. Of the remaining two aircraft, it has been revealed that the RX-78-1 is owned by Toei Heavy Industries, who reverse engineered the RX-78-1 into the "TH-G Mk-II". It is believed that the creation of this object is the reason why the main parts of SCP-2912-JP-1 and SCP-2912-JP-2 are completely compatible. The whereabouts of the remaining RX-78-3 is currently under investigation, as there are signs that the purchase records have been tampered with.

Since the Foundation's discovery of [http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/scp-1518-jp SCP-1518-JP], the United Diocese of Manhattan-Staten has been under total surveillance. However, its members secretly obtained RX-78-2 without being discovered by the Foundation, stored it in a hangar beneath a church facility on Manhattan Island, and modified it. Additionally, PoI-2912-JP-A stated that the purpose of purchasing and modifying it was to "prepare for the coming [[[scp-2217|Flesh Calamity]]]".

[[collapsible show="▶︎Access: Record Witness - Fillmore-1" hide="- Access Granted"]]

@@ @@

[[div style="display: inline-block; border-radius: 10px; border:dashed 1px #444444; background:#F5F5F5; float:top; width:95%; padding:15px"]]

[[=]]
+++ **Record 2001/09/19**
+++ Interview record: Fillmore- 1
[[/=]]

__**Interviewed:**__ PoI-2912-JP-A (Nathan Fillmore)

----
From the day [[[the-heresy-of-disassembly|His Holiness Bumaro]]] first revealed the "scourge of the flesh," we began to prepare. Among what we needed as soon as possible was a new [[[scp-2406|Colossus]]] that would keep the flesh away and imbue itself with the power of God. This is the SCP-2912-JP-1 you are talking about.

Why did they go to the trouble of manufacturing it themselves and buying it on the black market? ...Well, the [[[twistedgears-kaktus-proposal|Gulf of California]]] was too far from us.

//[Cut]//

Construction progressed smoothly. However, a problem arose. When believers of MEKHANE build utilizing mystic means, [https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/scp-cn-405 something often goes awry]. The person riding the colossus becomes slightly mentally abnormal. Unfortunately, the effects were too much for even the most senior priests to bear. However, the control AI allows for easy operation, but this drawback caused Colossus to fall into a slumber for a while.

[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[/collapsible]]

------

+++ Addendum.2912-JP.2 > Incident - September 11th

SCP-2912-JP is believed to have been established during a series of incidents related to [[[koigarezaki-news-911-1998-ver|the Manhattan Dimensional Collapse Terrorist Incident]]] [[footnote]]Database Code: See Manhattan Crisis.[[/footnote]], which occurred on September 11, 2001, led by the core unit of [[[chaos-insurgency-hub|GoI-003 ("Chaos Insurgency")]]].

[[div style="color: black; border: solid 1px #000000; background:#f2f2c2 url(http://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A5644609-106-2lvf/scp-trans.png) center no-repeat; padding:5px; margin-bottom: 10px;"]]
[[f<image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-001-%20ex/padlock.png]]
**These inferences have been drawn from multiple records provided by Groups of Interest, Persons of Interest, and observation equipment not owned by the Foundation.**

**Because this group of records has accounted for a significant portion of the preparation of this report, the reviewing staff should be aware that the following report is not fully accurate, and may contain footnotes, errors, or inconsistencies.**

**— Maria Jones, Director, Records and Information Security Administration (RAISA)**
[[/div]]

At approximately 8:20 a.m. on September 11, the Manhattan Crisis began with the hijacking of five transcontinental passenger planes. At the same time, the United Diocese of Manhattan-Staten was  holding an opening ceremony at its newly established church northeast of Central Park ("Jefferson Miller Church").  The ceremony featured the three main sects of the Church of the Broken God: GoI-004A ("Broken Church"), the oldest sect, GoI-004B ("Cogwork Orthodoxy"), which worships analog steam engines and clockwork; GoI-004C ("Maxwellist Church"), which interprets the deity as being established within a digital network. A sermon by led by PoI-2912-JP-A and a prayer for peace were planned, with many local residents attending. PoI-2912-JP-B, described in following Addenda, is believed to have participated in this.

[[collapsible show="▶︎Access: Record Witness - Fillmore-2" hide="- Access Granted"]]

@@ @@

[[div style="display: inline-block; border-radius: 10px; border:dashed 1px #444444; background:#F5F5F5; float:top; width:95%; padding:15px"]]

[[=]]
+++ **Record 2001/09/19**
+++ Interview record: Fillmore- 2
[[/=]]

__**Interviewed:**__ PoI-2912-JP-A(Nathan Fillmore)

----
When the incident occurred? Yes, the Maxwellists were the first to fall. What can I say about them... they're delicate[[footnote]]In reality, it is believed that the fainting was caused by the cyber implants of the members of the Maxwellist church malfunctioning due to radio interference caused by the occurrence of an abnormal dimension.[[/footnote]]. At first, I didn't fully understand the situation. I learned about the WTC via communication from the First Church [[footnote]]A church in the United Diocese of Manhattan and Staten located in the southwest of Manhattan Island.[[/footnote]] via [[[everyone-knows|steam cannon bullet communication]]] sent by a priest.

Yes, Orthodox.[[footnote]]"Orthodox" is the formal name given by the Broken Church to the Cogwork Orthodox Church. Its origin lies in the fact that the Cogwork Orthodox Church values ​​the mass production of machines through standardization. [[/footnote]] We have a number of means of communication that do not rely on radio waves. Some of them are hard to believe exist in the 21st century. Anyway, as soon as I knew what was going on, I explained the situation to everyone gathered there and told them to go home and start packing as soon as possible.

Those who remained were our priests, devout believers in God's blessings, and those who were unable to return due to circumstances beyond their control. Most of them had homes in the southern part of the island, but [[[gamers-against-weed-dossier|Jude]]]... The boy you call PoI-2912-JP-B simply said, "I don't want to go home."

[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[/collapsible]]

Evacuation of the general public in central Manhattan Island began on the evening of September 11th, in response to the anomalous dimension that continued to expand since earlier in the day. The evacuation route proposed at the time was from the southeastern part of Manhattan Island to the United Nations Headquarters Building [[footnote]]The United Nations Headquarters Building was set up as a temporary base by the Global Occult Coalition, and the surrounding area had been given the greatest spiritual protection.[[/footnote]] The route would move through Queens, and there was general agreement on its safety. The Foundation's evacuation guidance in accordance with this plan, along with the deployment of wide-area amnestics for sedation purposes proved effective. However, local traffic jams and riots could not be suppressed, and the large-scale evacuation of the public from central Manhattan would continue until the early hours of the 12th.

Evacuees from the central region flowed north, and public facilities such as parks and universities throughout the area were opened up as temporary evacuation centers. In this situation, Jefferson Miller Church also began accepting refugees, mainly members of the Church of the Broken God.

------

+++ Addendum.2912-JP.3 > Attack - September 12th
At around 3:00 am on September 12th, the entire Manhattan area was hit by a large-scale power outage. This was due to the Chaos Insurgency attacking power generation facilities around the island, including the Harlem River Yard Power Plant. Although the Foundation had anticipated an attack and had placed defenses at critical power-related facilities, sporadic suicide bombings by members of the Chaos Insurgency and the eventual use of [[[SCP-1068]]], many power generation facilities were downed. Additionally, loss of utilities such as water and gas was recorded in some areas due to similar attacks.

[[collapsible show="▶︎Access: Record Witness - Fillmore-3" hide="- Access Granted"]]

@@ @@

[[div style="display: inline-block; border-radius: 10px; border:dashed 1px #444444; background:#F5F5F5; float:top; width:95%; padding:15px"]]

[[=]]
+++ **Record 2001/09/19**
+++ Interview record: Fillmore- 3
[[/=]]

__**Interviewed:**__ PoI-2912-JP-A(Nathan Fillmore)

----
Many of the evacuees had special abilities. Probably because [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/system:page-tags/tag/backdoor-soho SoHo] is nearby. There was a circus man who breathed fire, and also a magician who summoned rain. What Jude had was the ability to manipulate electricity. As you know, electricity is essential for Maxwellists. They had the audacity to ask Jude to become a living generator.

What surprised me was how willingly Jude followed their instructions. I asked why.

"I'm a geek and an anomaly anyway, so it's normal for me to be treated poorly,'' Jude said, mocking himself. At that moment, I could definitely hear the sound of his heart rusting and creaking.

I admonished him. Regardless of his perceived status, all people are unfinished individuals, and compared to the great machine that is formed by combining them, they are nothing more than minute parts.

I took his hand and opened the door to the underground hangar. Inside the vast hangar, a large number of believers were busy working, and in the center was the Colossus. Yes, that is SCP-2912-JP-1 you are talking about. There, for the first time, Jude showed a look of surprise and joy that befits his age.

Then, the attack began.

[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[/collapsible]]

Around noon on September 12th, the first major offensive by multiple hostile entities took place. These hostile entities included demonic entities, Chaos Insurgency combatants, paratechnological weapons, and objects both known and unknown, some of which attacked the Jefferson Miller Church. Members of the Church of the Broken God, including PoI-2912-JP-A, have testified that they temporarily left SCP-2912-JP-1 and headed for the surface to engage with the enemy. The following is alog recorded by members of the Maxwellist Church.

[[collapsible show="▶︎Access: Record 2001/09/12 - Maxwellist Log-1" hide="- Access Granted"]]

@@ @@
[[div style="display: inline-block; border-radius: 10px ; border:dashed 1px #444444; background:#F5F5F5; float:top; width:95%; padding:15px"]]

[[=]]
+++ **Record 2001/09/12 - Maxwellist Log-1**

[[/=]]
----

__**Members:**__

* Manhattan-Staten United Diocese Broken Church Sect "Father" Nathan Fillmore (PoI-2912-JP-A)
* Manhattan-Staten United Diocese Gear Mikage Orthodoxy "Militant" Mary Stusey
* United Diocese of Manhattan-Staten Maxwellist Church Marcus Sparks

----
[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-2912-jp/%E6%95%B5%E3%83%AD%E3%83%9C.jpg|caption=Mechanical enemies climbing the barricades[[footnote]]These automatons possessed a [*http://scp-int.wikidot.com/raptor-tec-industries logo imitating the head of a carnivorous dinosaur] drawn on them.[[/footnote]].|align=center|width=250px]]

----
[Begin Log]

//[From the vantage point, multiple hostile entities can be seen approaching the church. They include a giant demonic entity, a cat-foot demonic entity, a demonic entity similar to a giant Jason Statham head, and a [[[golden-horde-blues|Mongolian cavalry unit]]].]//

**Mary Stussy:** Deploy the Iron Wall!

//[A lump of iron protrudes in an arc from the road in front of the church. The progress of the hostile entities is temporarily blocked.]//

**PoI-2912-JP-A:** Militant, the holy oil is ready.

//[Jefferson Miller Church members each hold a pail and a ladle filled with a hot liquid that appears to be industrial lubricant.]//

**Mary Stusey:** Not yet. Draw them in!

//[Multiple hostile entities begin to climb over the barricade.]//

**Mary Stussy:** Now, start anointing!

//[Members of the Church of Jefferson Miller simultaneously project lubricant onto the hostile entities. It doesn't seem to have much of a theological effect, but the demonic entities suffer damage, likely due to its high temperature.]//

**Mary Stussy:** Ready for second shot!

**Marcus Sparks:** Could you please stop spending so much money? The holy oil reserves here are low.

**Mary Stussy:** What a useless interjection by a technician in the Militant-Faithful[[footnote]]Militant-Faithful: Foreign/self-defense positions that directly deal with actual and potential threats to the Church. [[/footnote]], and this coming from a geezer like me!

**Marcus Sparks:** We're in charge! If you continue to use it in such a wasteful manner, you're the ones who will end up rusting due to oil leaks.

**Mary Stussy:** This is a battlefield, not a warehouse! If we hold back now, we won't be able to protect what we need!

**Marcus Sparks:** It's a matter of efficiency! There must be a better weapon!

//[Mary Stussy blows up oil-laced steam from her body, and Marcus Sparks makes a humming sound as his eyes glow red]// **

**PoI-2912-JP-A:** Both of you calm down. Please. What is needed now is unity, not discord. The situation is chaotic, but if we work together, I'm sure--

//[He is drowned out by a deep electrical sound. The source of the sound is a large entity resembling a [[[sc-99-734-01-506|centipede]]] made up of a series of luminescent 1m^^3^^ cubes.]//

**Marcus Sparks:** That's... It's like Centipede. [[footnote]]An arcade game released in 1981. The player shoots and destroys insects such as centipedes that snake their way from the top of the screen.[[/footnote]].

**PoI-2912-JP-A:** Do you know anything about it?

**Marcus Sparks:** Ah, an urban legend I saw on [[[parawatch-hub|Parawatch]]]. There's a [[[arcadia-hub|game cabinet]]] that sucks out the souls of the children that have played it and summons the demons that dwell within...

**Mary Stussy:** Shit, it's coming this way.

//[The centipede-shaped hostile entity begins to advance towards the Jefferson Miller Church. The barricades of demonic entities, rubble, and iron blocks in the path appear to disintegrate into voxels and disappear the moment they touch the entity's jaws]//

**Marcus Sparks:** Evacuate! All members, evacuate!

**Mary Stussy:** I we pull back here, what will happen to the believers behind us!?

**Marcus Sparks:** Are you planning on letting your men die in vain?

**PoI-2912-JP-A:** Until this moment-- 

//[The church building suddenly splits into two, and a mechanical arm emerges towards the approaching centipede-shaped entity. It grasps the body of the entity and lifts it up. SCP-2912-JP-1 slowly emerges from the church.]//

**Marcus Sparks:** Is that thing moving?!

**Mary Stussy:** What the hell? The Colossus is moving? Who on earth is on board?!

//[SCP-2912-JP-1 generates a slight electrical discharge from its armor's surface, causing crackling sparks.]//

**PoI-2912-JP-A:** ...Jude?

[End of Recording]

[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[/collapsible]]


[[collapsible show="▶︎Access: Record 2001/09/12 - Maxwellist Log-2" hide="- Access Granted"]]

@@ @@
[[div style="display: inline-block; border-radius: 10px; border:dashed 1px #444444; background:#F5F5F5; float:top; width:95%; padding:15px"]]

[[=]]
+++ **Record 2001/09/12 - Maxwellist Log-2**

[[/=]]
----
[Start Recording]

//[Note: This record was created by members of the Church of Maxwellism. This is the communication record between PoI-2912-JP-A and control AI-Birdeve.]//

__**Interviewed:**__ PoI-2912-JP-A (Nathan Fillmore)

----
The enemy increased in number and attacked us with ferocious force. [http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/ryogen Fires of colors I had never seen before], men in SWAT clothes threw [[[scp-994|UFO-like objects]]], [[[ringo|kangaroos]]] bounced as the earth rumbled, [[[scp-884-original-collection|buildings were obliterated]]], and [[[scp-244|thick fog]]] froze the area. . Meanwhile, Jude's Colossus reappeared. Probably trying to protect us.

But……. I still don't know how to describe what suddenly appeared after. Just by its presence, something in the world was fundamentally changed. My thoughts were painted over, and a tremor ran through my entire body, similar to the fear of the ancient darkness felt by primitive humans. I'm sure... no matter how many words I try, unless you were there, you wouldn't be able to understand what I saw. ...If there is one thing I can say for sure.

The monster, which could be mistaken for a god, was blood-red.

**<Begin Log>**

**O'Brien:** [The suspect is put into a somnambulant state and placed on a bed.]

**Eckert:** Let's get started. Basically, you can interview him through me. When I use my abilities too deeply, I go into a kind of trance state, but even in that state I respond to requests one by one.

**Schott:** Understood. 

**Packard:** Well, first of all... **Schott:** I investigated the details of the people the other day. Ask for details about something.

**Eckert:** A general heat-insulating container, an Arabian carpet, a weapon -- I don't know the details. **Packard:** A box?

**Eckert:** Yes. It looks like it's made of stone.

**O'Brien:** [The suspect begins to sweat profusely]

**Eckert:** He asked where he should take it... But no one knew about it. So, he reached into the box and...

**O'Brien:** [Suspect screams loudly]

**Schott:** Is he awake?

**Eckert:** [Removes her hand from the suspect's forehead] No, this seems like a memory he doesn't want touched. I think it's more likely that he forgot about it himself, or that he sealed it away.

**Packard:** Hmm, sealed? Is it different from mental protection?

**Eckert:** Yeah... This is rather primitive--I can't really put it into words. This is the first time I've come across this kind of thing. **Schott:** No problem, the guys in white coats will take care of interpreting the words later.

**Eckert:** Understood. Let's get back to it. [Puts her hand on the suspect's forehead]

**Eckhart:** The box is warmer than it looks. Human body heat? No, something hotter and more wonderful  poured out. The surface is pulsating... More inside---[Screams]

**O'Brien:** [Suspect screams at the same time]

**Schott:** This is bad. Stop!

**Packard:** Okay, I'll rip it off.

**O'Brien:** [Suspect is pulled away from Eckert] Red! Red! Blood! That box is made of blood, bones, and tendons suppressed by mixed coagulant!

**Eckert:** The Saturn Deer was no exception. All things trembled at the impending doom.

[Begin Log]

//[Members of the Jefferson Miller Church surround the destroyed SCP-2912-JP-1, and carry PoI-2912-JP-B from the cockpit.]//

**Marcus Sparks:** Is the pilot safe?

**Mary Stussy:** It's a wonder there's any flesh left after being so brutally beaten.

**PoI-2912-JP-A:** [Silence]

//[PoI-2912-JP-B is brought out in front of the three people]//

**PoI-2912-JP-B:** …… What.

**Mary Stussy:** Well, boy, you've done as you pleased. Are you prepared to have your body, which you were lucky enough to have survived, torn to pieces?

**Marcus Sparks:** I'm a little annoyed, but I agree with you on this one.

**PoI-2912-JP-B:** What! Do what you want! As if that's going to do anything--

//[PoI-2912-JP-A punches PoI-2912-JP-B in the face.]//

**PoI-2912-JP-A:** Enough, you idiot. What, do you think you're Superman, running around all by yourself!?

**PoI-2912-JP-B:** Uh, huh...

**PoI-2912-JP-A:** Listen, you're still a child. Why do you want to carry the world on your shoulders? We were so worried...

//[PoI-2912-JP-B sniffles and begins weeping.]//

**PoI-2912-JP-B:** I wanted to protect everyone. I thought that if I used the robot, I could protect you. But I lost my temper and ended up ruining everything. Birdeve saved me at the last minute using the emergency system. But, but...

//[PoI-2912-JP-B presents the damaged Birdeve interface.]//

**PoI-2912-JP-B:** Sorry...

//[PoI-2912-JP-A hugs PoI-2912-JP-B]//

**PoI-2912-JP-A:** It's okay, Jude. I forgive you. Mark, can you fix Birdeve?

**Marcus Sparks:** Hmmm... I see. The memory and CPU are okay. Only the gaff was burnt. Right now, it's easy to fix by just putting it into sleep mode.

**Mary Stussy:** Hmph. In any case, since we lost the Colossus, we have to find another way to defend ourselves.

//[Mary Stussy points to UE-1110. UE-1110 emits a pulsing sound and continuously absorbs red mist composed of surrounding water vapor, sulfur, base metals, vaporized lower alcohols, and the blood of unknown entities.]//

**Mary Stussy:** It's maturing. Its gradually materializing and appearing in this world. Even if it is technically just an infant now, it will eventually break out of its cradle and bring about destruction.

**PoI-2912-JP-A:** I guess the Colossus' attack was just annoying it...

**Mary Stussy:** All we have to do is give it a hard blow to get it out of bed.

**Marcus Sparks:** I see... Okay, let's take a seat!

**Mary Stussy:** Hey, where are you going at a time like this?

**Marcus Sparks:** Hey Militant, help me too! I've come up with a way to beat that red guy!

//[Marcus Sparks and Mary Stussy leave the field of view.]//

**PoI-2912-JP-A:** ...They're gone.

**PoI-2912-JP-B:** Hey, Father. Why did that priest talk like that?

**PoI-2912-JP-A:** Huh? ...Ah, this is the basics. It might be a problem for him as a priest, but his father's education was poor.

**PoI-2912-JP-B:** No, that's better. There was something suspicious about the way he spoke.

**PoI-2912-JP-A:** Haha. Really. I think I'll try preaching in this tone next time. ...However, I don't know if that time will come.

//[PoI-2912-JP-A glares at UE-1110.]//

**PoI-2912-JP-A:** My family have always been priests here in Manhattan. I grew up here and love it more than anything. That's why I get angry when such a shitheel makes such a big stink. In order to protect my hometown, I absolutely have to defeat it. Mary and Mark also make fun of me, but deep down they must be desperate.

**PoI-2912-JP-B:** But, that robot was the strongest, right? How are we going to--

//[PoI-2912-JP-A picks up a warhammer shaped like a welded gear.]//

**PoI-2912-JP-A:** It's simple. Don't give up. We will continue to scream out hope until our last breath.

By the afternoon of September 13th, Foundation/GOC defense forces were at a clear disadvantage. Although preparations were underway for an invasion operation from outside Manhattan Island with reinforcements, the expansion of the trans-dimensional area designated [[[SCP-2911-JP]]] failed to be effectively suppressed due to lack of supplies and personnel. As a result, the number of demonic entities exploded, and 75% of Manhattan Island, in addition to the Hudson River coastal area, became an anomalous zone. In addition, the [[[horizon-initiative-hub|Horizon Initiative]]], which was responsible for theological protection, notified the Foundation that the large-scale barrier that had been deployed earlier had collapsed due to the appearance of UE-1110.

In response to this situation, the defense forces decided to abandon Central Park, which had previously functioned as a front-line base, and retreat to areas such as Columbia University and Harlem. This meant that the Jefferson Miller Church, which had previously been behind the front lines, was now completely isolated among the enemy forces.

**[02m44s-]** Multiple [[[scp-3008|SCP-3008-2]]] entities appear from surrounding buildings, shouting the phrase "Customers, please refrain from playing with the displayed items.", approaching the trebuchet and its operators with hostile intent.

**[03m34s-]** To protect the trebuchet, members of the Jefferson Miller Church, including PoI-2912-JP-A who is equipped with a war hammer, engage the SCP-3008-2 entities. With the cooperation of the evacuees who had been sheltered at Jefferson Miller Church, the trebuchet is maintained.

**[06m49s-]** The trebuchet launches debris at UE-1110. The moment the debris makes contact, it distorts and disappears. There is no change in UE-1110, and the members of the Church of Jefferson Miller are visibly disappointed.

**[08m18s-]** A [http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/scp-1271-jp yellow signal flare] is launched by an unknown party. The number of SCP-3008-2 manifestations increases significantly, and the forces of the Church of Jefferson and Miller begin to gradually retreat.

**[013m37s-]** A large cruiser missile lands in the area, causing an explosion. This explosion destroys the trebuchet, causes the majority of SCP-3008-2 instances to disappear, and blows PoI-2912-JP-A out of sight of the video recording.

----
I was blown away by the explosion, and I don't remember how much time had passed when I woke up. However, when I woke up, I felt a gust of wind from behind.

When I turned around, I saw the stairs leading to the basement and noticed that the wind was coming from there. Yes, there is certainly nothing surprising about that. However, out of all the scenery I see every day, there was no way such a staircase would ever be there. It had existed before I knew it...or had I forgotten? ……sorry. Maybe I was confused at that time. That would be strange. I felt nostalgic for something that shouldn't exist.

The stairs were dusty and dim, the only light flickering unreliably. I looked over and saw a [[[scp-3790|metal hatch]]] at the end of the stairs and down the hallway. I tried to get a better look, but my attempts were interrupted by the screams of the demons attacking me.

While I was distracted by the stairs, I was surrounded by demons. As I reached for my warhammer to stand up again, a roar rang out. It seemed to be coming from the stairs, or more specifically, it seemed like the hatch was being slammed from inside with great force.

The demons also flinched and stared in the direction of the stairs. Eventually, there was a particularly loud sound, and the hatch was blown into the sky. What happened next was swift, but I remember it clearly. Coming out of the hatch was a thin white man with blond hair and gray eyes. He wore only simple clothes and iron jewelry, and his exposed skin was covered in tattoos that looked like demonic faces. The man took out a sword-like object from his own shadow and slashed at the demons around him, or tore them apart with his bare hands, wiping them out. Everything was over in an instant, and the blown hatch finally fell to the ground with a loud metallic sound.

The hatch had just one word written on it: [[a href="*http://scpclassic.wikidot.com/scp-076" class="color-green"]]__Able.__[[/a]]

Hello, dear new people. I am Gallant of the "Association." If possible, I would like you to call me Dr. Gallant, as I am a parascientist.

Let me be frank. I am trying to help you. Did the demon's coffin reach you properly? I hope it helped.

The world is infinitely accelerating toward instability, and people fear the change. But fear is never the answer. That is why we are challenging fear right here in Manhattan, right now. Even in a world that seems crazy, with love, courage, and an understanding that is willing to go hand in hand with the unknown, if only for a moment, the world will arc toward justice.

I have already made arrangements through old contacts. We should be ready tomorrow. Let us rise again. Together, we can make this world a little better than it is.

**ST9999-How:** Current location unknown. It probably isn't Chatham Street, but I was sent here as a result of being knocked into a portal. **Unidentified Woman:** I may have lived longer than I look. A long time ago, I was [http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/archives-f experimented on]----

**Unidentified Young Man:** So this old hag, whom she was in love with, left her with a body that never ages. Isn't that a sob story?

**Unidentified Woman:** This [EXPLATIVE REDACTED]!

**Unidentified middle-aged man:** Formerly [[[document-1780-wl|Thaddeus Xyank]]]. However, right now, I am [[[nobody-hub|nobody]]].

[Start playing]

**[00m00s-]** The camera shows a metal structure in an open area with multiple junk parts, damaged metallic everyday items, and a large amount of screws and nuts laying about.

**[00m04s-]** The perspective shifts to the people surrounding it and working together to build SCP-2912-JP-4. The group leading the effort clearly communicates through [http://scp-int.wikidot.com/the-hive-hub psionic abilities.]

**[00m34s-]** A swarm of spider star-shaped entities appear from the [[[the-five-mind|First Fifth Church of Manhattan]]] on Fifth Avenue. They entities have five eyes arranged in a star shape on their arms, and within the eyes [REDACTED], and luminescent humanoid figures within the pink smoke they spew. They are singing a song in chorus, which possesses a cognitohazardous effect and has a negative impact on SCP-2912-JP-4 construction work.

**[01m09s-]** The swarm of spider starfish type entities are crushed by [http://scp-int.wikidot.com/scp-es-125  countless refrigerators] falling at high speed from the sky. Around the point of impact, the patriotic song //Aegukka//[[footnote]]North Korean national anthem. [[/footnote]] echoes,  effectively nullifying the song of the spider starfish entities.

**[01m18s-]** The falling refrigerators end without warning. As the camera moves upward, it becomes clear that the arrival of the refrigerator is blocked by a huge structure floating in the air. The structure generally resembles a European-style castle[[footnote]]Sculpture and other features are similar to an [[[SCP-322]]] instance.[[/footnote]] which plays an up-tempo song very similar to //"Electrical Parade"//. Multiple flying demonic entities are sucked into the structure, and each time the structure absorbs one, it emits a synthesized "Let's have fun!"

**[01m37s-]** When the camera returns to the ground, an attempt is being made to use the remains of the refrigerators[[footnote]]Since then, no refrigerators have been confirmed to fall in the area. The connection to North Korean leader Kim Jong-il's [[[scp-2578|mysterious death]]], which occurred at the same time, is under investigation.[[/footnote]] as construction material for SCP-2912-JP-4. A voice says "If we don't hurry, we won't make it in time for sunset.''

**[01m40s-]** [[[scp-3930|A scream originating from an unknown location is audible.]]][[footnote]] Analysis shows that this scream is composed of over 1200 different voices, coming from the southwest.[[/footnote]]. A group of people dressed in white pass across the screen from the opposite direction. Symbols commonly found on the clothing of this group are representative of [[[second-hytoth-hub|Ortothan]]] mythology and religious beliefs.

**[02m03s-]** The music from the castle-shaped structure  gradually becomes lower pitched, and eventually the music changes to the characteristic rhythm of Queen's //[http://scp-int.wikidot.com/scp-905-jp "We Will Rock You".]// The vibrations cause the castle-shaped structure to tilt and descend. The surrounding demonic entities, underneath it begin to flee in anticipation of its fall.

**[02m17s-]** The castle-shaped structure's fall is halted by a collision with a [[[scp-4029|large office building]]] with 10 mechanical legs; which was traveling down 42nd Street. [[footnote]]The appearance is similar to the Japanese spider crab (//Macrocheira kaempferi//).[[/footnote]] The two structures are blown off-screen upon impact, creating a massive explosion similar to a fireworks display.

**[02m33s-]** As the camera turns to 42nd Street, a group of people wearing [[[scp-035|porcelain masks]]] can be seen [[[midnight-parade|lining up.]]] The group includes demonic entities and reanimated corpses, and the sky behind the group appears to be composed of [[[scp-2264|yellow colors and black stars]]]. There were reports that [[[SCP-701]]] was being performed at the New Amsterdam Theater on 42nd Street at the same time, though the connection between these two events is unknown.

**[02m41s-]** The space around SCP-2912-JP-4 is distorted, and 20 to 30 entities dressed like tourists appear. A woman in a suit standing at the front of the group of tourist-like entities has a sign on her upper arm that says "Tathagata" She wears an armband with Sanskrit characters printed on it. The woman then says the following:
> Come on, everyone. The place we're in is Manhattan in 2001 AD. We are currently in the midst of the historic Manhattan Crisis. The only time you can experience this fierce battle in person is on the time trip disaster tour offered by our company. Everyone has already been immortalized at the time of departure, so you can enjoy this tour without worrying about injury, illness, memetic infection, etc. However, in the unlikely event that you become unwell, please notify the nearest member of staff immediately.
>
> Now, the long-awaited free exploration portion of our tour begins. Photography, looting, and various destructive activities are permitted, but we ask that you strictly adhere to the meeting times. Well, everyone, go ahead and explore to your heart's content.

**[03m27s-]** As soon as the woman finishes speaking, the tourist-like entities start running and attack the masked group. The video ends with a voice saying, "There's no Wi-Fi here,'' presumably because the photographer came into contact with a tourist-like entity.

[End of playback]

[[<]]
# And the five bodies that should have been gathered in one place and were about to be assembled.
# The first piece is the torso and right arm. The Armor and Chassis of the Shattered Warrior.
# The second piece is the left arm. A fist of fury that crushes all monsters.
# The third piece is the right leg. Legs of bloody battle dyed in the orange color of destruction.
# The fourth piece is the left leg. Immortal legs created from the remains of magic.
# The fifth piece is the brain. An original computing machine that brings wisdom and intuition.
# Priest Nathan Fillmore chanted while holding the fragment:
# "Blessed be the image of God that we shall be built from this.''
# "The work we can accomplish will never be complete, but may we perform miraculous works in this moment, even if it is not forever.'"

+++ Addendum.2912-JP.6 > Decisive Battle - September 14th

On September 15, at approximately 10:00 a.m., the Site-28 frontline command center intercepted a suspicious communication recording. Later investigation revealed that the communication was made by George R[[footnote]] A reporter for the Koikorozaki Shimbun newspaper. Real name unknown. It is speculated that he has connections with the multidimensional company [https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/ecohub ECO Publishing], and has established a cooperative relationship with the company and Koikoraki Shimbun.[[/footnote]] and Takayuki Hirosue [[footnote]] Koikorozaki Shimbun reporter. The Foundation's extensive investigation revealed that he graduated from Meiji University's Faculty of Political Science and Economics and worked for 10 years in the general affairs department of Toei Heavy Industries' head office, before leaving the company and joining Koikorozaki Shimbun.[[/footnote]]. On September 13th, Takayuki Hirosue approached Manhattan Island in a rowboat despite the Foundation's blockade. It is believed that he attempted to photograph the anomalous space at close range, but disappeared in the process. It is unknown why Takayuki Hirosue remained alive despite similar actions resulting in the loss of Foundation agents.

+++ Addendum.2912-JP.7 > Aftermath

The area around Manhattan returned to baseline reality on September 15th, and the Foundation had a full picture of the damage caused by September 19th. As a result, the existence of SCP-2912-JP and related records were revealed, and a proposal was made within the Foundation to relocate SCP-2912-JP for containment at an appropriate site. However, due to the media coverage of SCP-2912-JP, the resulting public outcry, as well as the low threat level of SCP-2912-JP itself, the containment proposal was withdrawn and current protocol was ultimately established.

The public outcry against the SCP-2912-JP protocol is attributed to a decline in the Foundation's public appeal for the following reasons:
* The traditional balance of power among paranormal organizations was shifting as smaller paranormal organizations, led by [[[wilson-s-wildlife-solutions-hub|Wilson's Wildlife Solutions]]], gained public support in the wake of the collapse of the veil.
* The fact that CI, the main terrorist organization behind the Manhattan Crisis, are an offshoot of the Foundation.
* The U.S. government expressed distrust of the Foundation's and GOC's response.
* The activities of PoI-2912-JP-A and other individuals outside the Foundation were highlighted in the press.
* The series of records related to SCP-2912-JP were widely accepted by the public because they provided an image of citizens solving their own problems without relying on institutions.

It was decided that SCP-2912-JP would be preserved as a monument to 9/11. It is known as "The Mekhanite" and is one of New York's leading tourist attractions. The following is a record of PoI-2912-JP-A's speech at the ceremony when Manhattan's Mekhanite was opened to the public for the first time after the investigation into SCP-2912-JP was completed.

[[collapsible show="▶︎Access: Speech Record - Fillmore" hide="- Access Granted"]]

[[div style="display: inline-block; border:dashed 1px #999999; background:#F5F5F5; float:center ; width:84%; padding:1px 15px; margin: 10px 10px 10px 40px"]]

Thank you for giving me this opportunity to speak to you all today.

What you see now is the remains of a machine that once worked. There may be some of you who have this misunderstanding, so I'll say it first. This isn't junk left over from the evacuation center that wasn't removed, right?

//[laughter]//

Well, you aren't completely wrong. It is true that part of this mechanical structure is assembled from junk parts. And this fact can lead to an interesting opinion. In other words, even if you are a piece of junk, if we all come together you can fight like a hero.

This opinion can also be applied to humans. Maybe we just think of ourselves as junk. Have you ever thought, "Compared to other people, how insignificant and small I am as a person'?' All things are parts that make up the world. There is very little difference between you and other people. After all, both are parts of the world.

All people are just unfinished individuals. The history of humankind is that things that are nothing more than minute parts in various shapes that have survived drastic changes in environments by coming together.

Our world is currently exposed to a threat unprecedented in human history. [http://scp-int.wikidot.com/early-summer-1998 Divine rampages], [http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/r-sinano-chuo-co-jp-2038-05-18-1730hk1 terrorism], [http://scp-int.wikidot.com/tokyo-incidents various disasters], and [http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/scp-2041-jp abnormal diseases]. All of these problems are difficult to solve, and we will continue to have to deal with them. If we remain divided, humanity will not escape destruction from these threats. Now is the time to unite against the great enemy.

Is that an impossibility? Will the followers of MEKHANE continue to tussle with the Nälkä until the end of time? No, I do not think so. Ladies and gentlemen, please pay attention to me one last time. Manhattan's Mekhanite is already nothing but a broken machine. But it is a symbol of the unbreakable spirit that all those who believe in love, peace, and freedom can unite across the barriers of organization, faith, and interest.

Let's help each other. If we do that, nothing is impossible for us.

//[Applause]//

Thank you. Lastly, I would like to say a word to the people who will come here in the future.

Welcome to Manhattan, the melting pot of the human race and existence. No matter who you are, we welcome you.

//[Even louder applause]//

[[/div]]
